name: mushy
content:
mushy adjective
(SOFT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
soft and having no firm shape: Cook the lentils until they are mushy.disapproving The meat was mushy and tasteless.

mushy adjective
(EMOTIONAL)
informal disapproving too emotional: I hate those mushy love stories.
